committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to compensate depositary institutions which maintain Treasury tax and loan accounts for services which they perform for the Department of the Treasury.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to compensate depository institutions which maintain Treasury tax and loan accounts for services performed by such institutions for the Department of the Treasury.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to compensate depositary institutions which maintain Treasury tax and loan accounts for services which they perform for the Department of the Treasury.
